Stephen Hullender


About Me


My name is Stephen Hullender

I'm a student attending <university> for the Class of 2022, undergoing a Bachelors of Science in Computer Science. I am currently looking for work, and am open to any internship or job available. I am currently working on some personal and side projects to enhance my skill set within the technology sector.

In my free time, I like to spend time playing computer games and draw. In the past year, I've learned how to cook, as well as find practical hobbies such as solving puzzles. Outside of school and free-time, I am a volunteer at my university food pantry, and am a part-time associate for Amazon Prime Logistics.

Please feel free to contact me using the Links section below.

Projects

C Hello World Walkthrough

Introduced new users to basics of C and Linux to create Hello World program. Tabulated instructions into a technical documentation page.

Minesweeper

Replicated a copy of Minesweeper and assembled a multiplayer version of Minesweeper to enable collaborative mode and team-based minigames.

Quick Bookmark Application

Assembled an application to bookmark files and webpage contents using icon-based directories using relational databases and tab manager.
